name: And Just Breathe
description:
A game designed to decrease anxiety and stress, for short-term relief.

Set in a Japanese garden, your goal is to find the ornaments; each with a different anxiety-reducing technique (such as breathing exercises), but there are also some other small activities to find along the way as your explore.

Choose to play either a daytime or night-time scene.

Controls:

WASD to move

Mouse to move camera

E to interact (when prompted)

ESC for pause menu
